Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit an RBI double and scored on Austin Wells' two-run single as New York scored three times in the third inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the first game at Wrigley Field for the Yankees since 2017
Others: Anthony Rizzo went 1 for 3 with a walk in his first game at Wrigley since he was traded by Chicago to New York in July 2021
